sentences.en: Confirmation can be obtained by detecting extensive necrosis through careful digital palpation.
sentences.cn: 通过仔细的手指触诊,能从检查出的广泛坏死而获得确诊.

sentences.en: Do your users a favor and never create another confirmation dialog box.
sentences.cn: 请为你的用户做点好事,不要再创建另外的确认对话框了.

sentences.en: He nodded, as if her reaction was all the confirmation he needed.
sentences.cn: 他点了点头, 似乎她的反应就是他所需要的证词.

sentences.en: Here, graphically displayed, was confirmation of the entire story.
sentences.cn: 通过这里形象的展示证实了整件事的真实性。

sentences.en: Most hotels require confirmation from a prospective guest in writing.
sentences.cn: 大多数宾馆都要求预订房间的客人写书面确认函。

sentences.en: Nixon talked about his accomplishments, asking for confirmation and reassurance.
sentences.cn: 尼克松谈到了他取得的成就, 征求认可和鼓励.

sentences.en: Ralph looked for confirmation round the ring of faces.
sentences.cn: 拉尔夫环顾着四周,看着一张张面孔,寻求大家的赞同.

sentences.en: She glanced over at James for confirmation.
sentences.cn: 她扫了詹姆斯一眼，想得到他的确认。

sentences.en: So, why does It'still issue the confirmation message?
sentences.cn: 既然这样, 它为什么还要发起确认信息?

sentences.en: The bankers had definite confirmation today that Tsinan's been evacuated. "
sentences.cn: 退出济南的消息,今天银行界里已经证实了. ”

sentences.en: The police are seeking independent confirmation of certain details of the story.
sentences.cn: 警方正在寻找案件某些细节的独立证据.

sentences.en: There has still been no official confirmation of the report.
sentences.cn: 这则报道仍未得到官方证实。

sentences.en: Travel arrangements are subject to confirmation by State Tourist Organisations.
sentences.cn: 旅行安排有待州旅游组织的确认。

sentences.en: We are waiting for confirmation of the news.
sentences.cn: 我们正在等待证实那个消息.

sentences.en: We need confirmation in writing before we can send your order out.
sentences.cn: 给你们发送订购的货物之前,我们需要书面确认.

sentences.en: We would appreciate confirmation of your refusal of our invitation to take part.
sentences.cn: 若您确认拒绝我们的邀请不能参加，我们将感激不尽。

sentences.en: Written confirmation came three days later.
sentences.cn: 三天后获得了书面确认.
